Othmane Bali, ezigbo aha ya bụ Mbarek Athmany, (May 1953 na June 2005) bụ onye Algeria Tuareg na-agụ egwu.
Bali wepụtara abọm mbụ ya n'afọ 1986, ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ n'ịkwalite egwu Tuareg n'asụsụ Tamahaq. Bali e sorola ndị na-agụ egwú a ma ama n'ụwa dịka Steve Shehan rụkọọ ọrụ.

Bali nwụrụ n'ihe mberede n'ụgbọala ya mgbe idei mmiri nke osimiri na mpaghara obodo ya nke Djanet. Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, nwa ya nwoke Nabil Bali gara n'ihu n'ihe nketa ya ma gaa n'otu ụzọ ahụ nke nna ya gara.
